com.itextpdf.text.pdf

Class FloatLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itextpdf.text.pdf.FloatLayout

  • public class FloatLayout
extends Object
    Helper class for PdfDiv to put a collection of Element objects at an absolute position.
